#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;
inline long long int scanInt()
{
    long long int noRead=0;
    char p=getchar_unlocked();
    for(;p<33;)
    {
        p=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    while(p>32)
    {
        noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
        p=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return noRead;
}
int main()
{
     long long t,n,avg=0,sum=0,i,k,surplus=0,temp;
     scanf("%lld",&t);
     while(t--)
     {
         n=scanInt();
         k=scanInt();
          avg=k;
          sum=k;
          surplus=0;
          for(i=1;i<n;i++)
          {
               k=scanInt();
               if(k<avg)
               {
                    if(k+surplus>=avg){surplus-=(avg-k);}
                    else{temp=surplus;surplus=((avg*i)+k+surplus)%(i+1);avg=((avg*i)+k+temp)/(i+1);}
               }
               else
               {
                   surplus+=(k-avg);
                    
               }
              // cout<<surplus<<" "<<avg<<endl;
          }
          printf("%lld\n",avg);
     }
     return 0;
}
